name: Vader (V)
Lore: 'Sought to extinguish all Jedi. Former student of Obi-Wan Kenobi. Seduced by the dark side of the Force.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  Jedi are defense value -1 and forfeit -2 at same and related sites.  During battle, if you are about to draw a card for weapon or battle destiny, may instead use an Interrupt of destiny < 4 from hand.  Immune to attrition < 5.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
